flares.upgraded: You may do up to 3 standard moves, using your common pieces.

legends.name: Storm Elemental
legends.text: You may place 1 piece of your color on an empty square up to distance 3. With it, do up to 1 (if legendary), 3 (if heroic), or 5 (if common) combat moves in one direction. Then destroy it.

legends.name: Fire Dragon
legends.text: Choose one of the indicated directions: Destroy all non-legendary pieces up to distance 2 in that direction and in both directions at 45 degrees to it.

faction_cards.name: Forest Ancient
faction_cards.text: Place 2 enemy common pieces on empty squares up to distance 2. Then destroy 2 common pieces of the same color or colors up to distance 3.

faction_cards.name: Sylvan Princess
faction_cards.text: You may convert 1 common enemy piece on a diagonally adjacent square to your common piece.

faction_cards.name: Tree Shepherd
faction_cards.text: Choose 1 of your pieces: If it is common, upgrade it; if heroic, it may do 1 combat move; if legendary, it may do 1 standard move.

tasks.name: Green Conquest
tasks.text: You have at least 3 pieces on green squares, and at least 2 of them are upgraded.

tasks.name: Red Conquest
tasks.text: You have at least 3 pieces on red squares, and at least 2 of them are upgraded.

tasks.name: Central Dominance
tasks.text: You have at least 5 pieces on the nine central squares, and at least 2 of them are upgraded.

tasks.name: Envelopment
tasks.text: You have at least 7 pieces adjacent to the same enemy piece.
